com.toolrental.data

Class RentalCharges

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.toolrental.data.RentalCharges

  • public class RentalCharges
extends java.lang.Object
    RentalCharges is a bean class mainly with properties, setters and getters which contains the immediate output of the pricing lookup in ToolRentalManager.checkout().

    Once an instance is created, it is used by ToolRentalManager as the nucleus for building a RentalAgreement object.

    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $Date: 2024/12/03 12:00:00
    Author:
    Michael Escott
